channel.title: PI need help (make it so if 3 hp, it kills the player or goes to 0)
channel.description:
Title says it.
read this to help you understand
A the guy has 700 hp
B the guy specs him a 670 +
A has 3 hp. And it goes to 0 or kills him. lol. SOmething that makes him die. please help.
